sentences.en: a highly seasoned piece of fish
Coat the fish with seasoned flour.
sentences.cn: 用拌有佐料的面粉将鱼裹上。

sentences.en: Ensure that new wood has been seasoned.
Even among seasoned mountaineers Pinnacle Ridge is considered quite a tough proposition.
sentences.cn: 即使在经验丰富的登山者中，平纳克尔峰也被认为是很难攀登的。

sentences.en: He likes to eat mutton which was seasoned with garlic.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢吃用大蒜调味的羊肉.

sentences.en: He's the seasoned veteran, who has taken the children to the museum many times.
sentences.cn: 他多次带着孩子参观博物馆, 经验十分丰富.

sentences.en: Heat the seasoned stock until it is bubbling.
sentences.cn: 将调好味的肉汤加热至沸腾。

sentences.en: Seasoned veterans were picked to storm the difficult enemy position.
sentences.cn: 有经验的老兵被挑选出来去突袭难攻的敌军阵地.
她是富有经验的音乐会演奏家.

sentences.en: The author is a seasoned academic.
sentences.cn: 作者是一位经验丰富的学者。

sentences.en: The contract stipulates for the use of seasoned timber.
sentences.cn: 合同上订明用干透的木料.

sentences.en: The soldiers were not yet seasoned to the rigorous climate.
sentences.cn: 士兵们尚未能适应此种严寒的气候.
这木材已经干燥可用了.

sentences.en: There are seasoned professionals who can teach you and show you what to do.
sentences.cn: 有经验丰富的专家教你，并向你演示怎么做。

sentences.en: This meat should be seasoned with salt and mustard.
sentences.cn: 这肉里应该加点盐和芥末调味.
沃尔特用咖喱给牛肉调味.

words.tran_cn: 时期；季节；赛季；vt. 给…调味；使适应；vi. 变得成熟；变干燥
调味品；调味的人；使用调味物的人
经验丰富的；老练的；调过味的

trans.tran_cn: 调过味的，成熟的，老练的
trans.tran_en: used to describe someone who has a lot of experience of a particular thing
